This offer includes a 30-day satisfaction guarantee, during which you can return the product if you're not completely satisfied. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience! Let me know what you think. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
